body: Khalid, If all that you need is the diffuse horizontal illuminance under an unobstructed sky, you can find the data in the epw file like so: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/wyIASLP0fE-xtM-L21DYezY6GdPpQQeueL7hGUxwkho2JlSCo-plR5zGF-rWaweBlC-ZznslEDQOE3mMlQPZdtMhwTj0ReFT/DiffIllum.JPG) Let me know if I am understanding that is all that you need. -Chris
